LanguageData.SO_MutatorMultiplierTooltip: The commonality of map features in a non-landmark map will be multiplied by this number (20 means a given map feature will be 20 times as common). Requires making a new planet!
LanguageData.SO_LandmarkMutatorMultiplierTooltip: The commonality of map features in landmark maps will be multiplied by this number (20 means a given landmark feature will be 20 times as common). Requires making a new planet!
